about_the_game:
Claim your vengeance across the sun-scorched world of Akhara

In the heart of the vast desert, you were betrayed – slain by the very gods you served. But a vengeful spirit calls you back from the abyss, binding you to a whispered prophecy – a warrior destined to claim vengeance and purge the desert of its traitors.

Game Features

  • Stylized Pixel Art: Explore a vibrant, stylized pixel art world inspired by the myths and legends of ancient Egypt.

  • Light-fantasy Story: Discover a new vibrant fantasy world teeming with diverse environments, captivating lore, and strange characters.

  • Precise Controls: Dash, jump, and slash with pinpoint precision.

  • Side-Scrolling Perilous Platforming: Scale crumbling tombs and murky swamps. Every run offers a fresh test of your skill and reflexes, promising the exhilarating thrill of a 'This is the one' moment.

  • 2D Climactic Combat: Fluid, fast-paced combat features a vast array of weapons, each demanding its own combat style. Master combos, outsmart huge cast of enemies, and unleash devastating special attacks across 5 distinct locations.

  • Legendary Boss Battles: Confront the gods themselves in epic, fast-paced boss battles. Evade the relentless attacks of the God of War, and outwit the illusions of the Serpentine Goddess of Chaos

  • Loot: Choose your build wisely as you discover a huge variety of powerful items and devastating weapons. Wield the forbidden 'Book of the Dead', claim the enourmous 'God Cleaver', or risk it all for the devastating, but cursed, 'Leech Heart'.

  • Strategic Spending: Upgrade at the merchant or gamble your hard-earned gold at the mystery box for a shot at legendary loot!

  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750

short_description: A Tale of sand and Bone is a story-rich action-roguelike adventure. You play as Shai, a fallen warrior bound to a vengeful spirit as you climb and fight your way to claiming vengeance against the gods.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Polish
*languages with full audio support
